name: Hard Hat Rebuild
description:
Thank you for taking the time to try out this demo of Hard Hat - Rebuild!  This is a 20th anniversary re-imagining of my first truly completed Mega Man fan game, Hard Hat.  This re-imagining seeks to balance the game play of the original HH series as well as just a nostalgic project for me.

CONTROLS:

  • Z - Jump
  • X - Shoot
  • C - Special Attack
  • A - Previous Weapon
  • S - Next Weapon
  • Space - Pause

The controls for both the gamepad and keyboard are customizable

SAVING:

The game automatically saves on game over and victory

I hope you enjoy this re-imagining and thank you for playing!
